entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.4°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 92 %

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this afternoon. High zero. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Thursday 28 April 2016
